Full_descriptions.0: Isolated showers and thunderstorms after midnight.  Partly cloudy, with a low around 74. South southeast wind around 5 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 20%.

Full_descriptions.4: Mostly clear, with a low around 72. Southwest wind around 5 mph becoming calm  after midnight.
